snippet: A cardboard sculpture with an oceanic theme will be displayed outside the Aldrich Contemporary Art Museum, where it will be transformed by the elements and gradually destroyed.
abstract: James Grashow sculpture Corrugated Fountain, which is made entirely of cardboard, will be displayed outside the Aldrich Contemporary Art Museum in Ridgefield, where it will be transformed by the elements and gradually destroyed (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
lead_paragraph: A cardboard sculpture with an oceanic theme will be displayed outside the Aldrich Contemporary Art Museum, where it will be transformed by the elements and gradually destroyed.

headline.main: A Cardboard Fountain, Braving the Elements
headline.print_headline: A Cardboard Fountain, Braving the Elements
